value.name: My Rival in Love is Me
value.overview: A socially awkward programmer, Yang Can, develops an immersive experience system to fulfill his girlfriend Ye Bingbing’s dream of a romantic, drama-like love story. Using this technology to express his feelings, Yang Can plans to propose to her during the experience, but as the story unfolds, the line between fantasy and reality blurs, revealing deeper truths about love and self-growth.
